![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5652049/36983577-b2f89482-2060-11e8-94ea-4f2d0b9d33e3.png).

The order of the types in the error message is definitely misleading though, we will look into it. Thank you for reporting it @tejaskhot.
